API Documentation
================

This section provides comprehensive documentation for the API.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   overview
   authentication
   endpoints
   examples

API Overview
-----------
General overview of the API functionality and architecture.

Authentication
-------------
Details about API authentication and security measures.

API Endpoints
-----------

Questions Database
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* GET /questions - Retrieve questions
* POST /questions - Add new questions
* PUT /questions/{id} - Update question
* DELETE /questions/{id} - Delete question

Analysis Tools
~~~~~~~~~~~~
* GET /analysis - Get analysis results
* POST /analysis/run - Run new analysis

Usage Examples
------------
Code examples and implementation guidelines.
